title: How it works
description: Duradry is designed for individuals who suffer from excessive sweating and are looking for an effective solution to reduce underarm perspiration. If you're tired of constantly worrying about sweat stains, Duradry could be the answer you've been searching for.

title: Ingredients
description: Yes, Duradry is formulated with ingredients that are gentle on your skin. It has been dermatologically tested to ensure it does not cause irritation. However, if you have sensitive skin, it's always a good idea to do a patch test before using it on a larger area.

title: Shipping times
description: We ship Duradry to a variety of locations worldwide. Whether you're in the US, Europe, or beyond, we strive to deliver our products directly to your doorstep in the most efficient way possible.
